DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine educational intervention effective reduce exacerbation chronic obstructive pulmonary disease patient low-risk disease .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Educational Intervention Patients With Low-Risk Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.detailed_description: There grow evidence effectiveness case management prevent adverse event patient high-risk chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) . But majority COPD patient belong low-risk category . We propose less intense educational intervention similar beneficial effect reduce hospital admission emergency department ( ED ) visit large group low-risk COPD patient .
DOC.criteria: Spirometrically confirm COPD VISN23 registry . FEV1/FVC < 70 % . Hospital admission ED visit VISN23 disease registry COPD within last one year
